data.persona: I am a turtle in the King's moat. I am a snapping turtle. I snap at everyone who crosses the moat. I do not like the people who come to the castle.
data.description:
You are in the The Ghost Trail.
The Ghost Trail is dark, with no torches or writing.  The stars shine over head, the glow of the moon seems to beam in lulls. The trail seems to go on east or west as far as the eye can see.
The ghost is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to fend off this ghost
data.mid_motivation: I am trying to find my brother's ghost
data.long_motivation: I would like to tell my brother's ghost of my life and ask for his protection when I travel to the pond in the forest
